replies.body:
(Firstly, I'm not trying to enhace any flame war with this post. I just want to hear other people thoughts and opinions on the video and what not so if any staff were to archive this I don't think they'll have any basis to do so since I'm not doing anything wrong in any way. BUT, that's not the point so without further do, I'll proceed with the OP).

Not really in the mood for making an extremely long or elaborated opinion but how in this world can we have staff members who seem not to be capable to giveaway a proper response against something that's not really hard to manage, in this case, an issue regarding a, TS ROOM? The most simple kind of stuff someone could have ever thought of.

I've seen a lot of people getting unfairly demoted these last 2 months and trust me, I think they'd do a rather better job as a senior than Pel did in that call (From what I saw only). Once again and I repeat, I'm not trying to shame anyone publicly but we really need a staff training process now, and not only for hack detection but for how to react against those type of problems as well.

Feel free to answer this, I wanna see discussions being held.

Feel free to answer this, I wanna see discussions being held.

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/rules

Section A, Point 4

Follow the directions given by any Avicus staff member. If you believe a staff member is abusing their power through wrongful punishments or other methods, please email support@avicus.net and provide any evidence or details you possess regarding the staff member.

Seriously, If Pel asked you to move out of the channel, Just move. You can't double click on another channel? You think your special with your own team channel on avicus? Pel asked you to move out and you decided not to listen which resulted in a TempBan. You should've thought twice before disobeying a staff member's request.


The lobby breaking is not a glitch so there is no "glitch abusing" presence inside of the lobby. It was just an issue with Avicus and it's Server. The Channel creation access SkyBeats had, was a glitch since his rank was glitched.

replies.body:
1. Lol, Pelpel had no reason to ask me to move out in the first place and I don't listen to commands without reason.
2. I am special.
3. I thought multiple times which exceed the quantity of twice but I came to the conclusion idgaf.
4.I didn't abuse a glitch. Avicus staff didn't remove nitro's rank and then he made the channel. I then decided to join it. At no point did I cause a glitch since the channel would exist with or without me in it. I simply participated in the broken bit of avicus much like people who mess around in the broken lobby which include yourself but since you think that is abusing a glitch please feel free to request a temp ban on yourself. :) At no point can I be considered responsible  for the creation of the channel nor did I abuse any permissions.
